categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: A female Corellian worked as a journalist on the planet Corellia at the time of the Galactic Civil War.

This journalist wrote for various major news HoloStations throughout the galaxy and was well known for her surprise exposes. In 1 ABY the journalist asked a spacer on the streets of Tyrena to visit the Imperial Stronghold on Corellia. She couldn't visit the base herself, as the Empire was aware of her activities and didn't allow her to get near the stronghold. She uploaded the stronghold's coordinates to the spacer's datapad, hoping that she could use the adventurer's observations in future news stories.

The excited journalist is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. She is one of many herald NPCs that were added to the game shortly after its launch to point players to dungeons and other points of interest. When a player talks to her and agrees to help, a waypoint is added to the player's datapad. When the player talks to her again, the same dialogue starts from the beginning.
